answers.answer: cguro natakot lang siya na sabihin sayo pero nothing to worry lalo kung may vaccine ka for hepa B kasi may panlaban kana kung talagang mahal mo cia mas ngayon ka nia kelangan..kagaya ko may hepa B ako pero lately lang nmen nalaman we also had sexual relations several times yet dko parin cia nahawaan ngayon nasa saudi na cia patunay lang d lahat ng may hepa B ay nakakahawa mas lalo akong minahal ng boyfriend ko at pinatunayan nia yon yung nagkalayo..ngayon sa pag-uwi nia nagpaplano na kami magkaroon ng baby kaya kung talagang mahal mo ang bf mo hindi mananaig sayo galit kung hindi puso mo  na magsasabi dadamayan mo cia hangang sa huli.....

TAMA SI SIS AMAREDLAV........ wla nman syang ibang sirain sa vital organ mo maliban sa liver mo, kaso nga lng kasi pagpinakinggan mo virus kasi kaya prang nkakatakot isipin at kung maalagaan mo nman liver mo at healthy lifestyle kayo so wlang problima. wla nman syang pinagka iba sa diabetes at highblood.  hay nku !!!!!!

question: My bf did not tell me about having hepatitis B for quite some time.We had sexual relations several times, although we used condoms every time. He said he was afraid of telling me because of me rejecting him. I am not infected. But I am not sure if I can trust him again, shall I forgive him or this is too big to forgive?
title: Dating someone with Hepatitis B
